item.description:
EVENT: Join us for a Mosaic of Mass tradition – our annual winter weekend trip to the Bethel Inn
in Bethel, ME. (When we are there, it turns into Beth El!). Enjoy the comforts of a first class inn for
two nights, two sumptuous buffet breakfasts, a Saturday night 3-course gourmet dinner, a swim in
an outdoor heated pool, and a workout room all at an unbelievably reasonable price. Nearby is
Sunday River (info at www.sundayriver.com), a world class downhill ski resort renowned for its
snow conditions even this early in the ski season. After skiing and dinner on Saturday evening,
relax by the fireplace and enjoy games and good conversation. You can read more about the
Bethel Inn at http://www.bethelinn....

The Trip Coordinators: are Henri Menco and Barry Polsky and for any questions send them an email at: bethel@mosaicmass.org

MEET: A list of members will be made available for the purpose of facilitating ride sharing to the inn
on Friday evening (about a 3 ½ hour drive from Boston).

RSVP: Required by Monday, November 17. Mail your check, made out to MOMC of MA, to Barry Polsky:
77 Hancock st, Somerville MA 02144. Please include your town, email address, phone number(s), whether you would like a lift ticket for Sunday River, who you would like as a roommate, whether you agree to be on a list for carpooling, and whether you have any objection to being included on a list of participants. Absolutely no reservations will be taken after December 11. First come, first serve with respect to rooms - most of our rooms will be in the main inn but later registrants will be given rooms in the Oaks or Pines, a short walk from the main building. The latest registrants will be offered rooms in outlying buildings about a 10-minute walk from the main inn - you will be informed beforehand if this is your only choice.

COST: Includes two nights lodging, two breakfasts, and one gourmet dinner. Regular rate is an amazing $185. Early bird rate is even more amazing $180 if we get your check by November 10th. The Late rate is $200 if we get your check after November 17. Late checks will be accepted only as availability allows.
There are a very limited number of single rooms available –add $50 to the rate if you want a single room.
There are larger deluxe rooms available for an extra $90 per person for doubles or $100 per person for
singles. Reserving one of these rooms guarantees that you will be in the main inn. There is an option to
arrive earlier than Friday or stay later than Sunday for an additional $110 per night double occupancy, you
can call the inn directly to make these arrangements.

LIFT TICKETS: We will be ordering our lift tickets directly through the Bethel Inn. When you RSVP, please indicate whether you would like a lift-ticket. If so, how many days do will you be skiing? Also, are you or anyone in your party a Senior (over 65), Young Adult (13-18), or Junior (6-12)? We must have your request
for lift tickets by December 14. You will pick up your lift-ticket when you check in and the cost will be charged
to your room Account. More info will be forthcoming as to lift ticket prices but they will be substantially less
than mountain prices.
